casebody.data:
People ex rel. Brush Illuminating Co., Appellant, v. Wemple, Comptroller, Respondent. (Supreme Court, General Term, Third Department. September 25, 1891.)

Argued before Learned, P. J., and Landon and Mayham, JJ.

No opinion. Motion to amend granted. For opinion on appeal, see 15 N. Y. Supp. 718.
